author: shalin
msg: SOLR-4797: Shard splitting creates sub shards which have the wrong hash range in cluster state. This happens when numShards is not a power of two and router is compositeId

author: shalin
msg: SOLR-4798: use correct router during index splitting

author: shalin
msg: SOLR-4795: Sub shard leader should not accept any updates from parent after it goes active
